Cosella

Time Remaining:

Instructions

The object of the game is to match icons. You are able to match two icons at a time through the following four cases. The path which you can match icons can only change directions three times.

Match by forming a straight line vertically or horizontally.

Match by forming a "L" path in any direction.

Match by forming a "U" path in any direction.

Match by forming a Zig-Zag pattern in any direction.

Well you beat that level...

Are you ready for the next round??
